Name: Eider Duck
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: As Jason Clapham (the Difford's Guide reader who brought this citrusy sweet 'n' sour cocktail to my attention in February 2020) says, it's "essentially a cherry Sidecar ." Those with sweeter palates may want to add a splash of sugar syrup.
History: First published in William James "Billy" Tarling's 1937 Café Royal Bar Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Eider Duck contains 154 calories
